name: Whopper
description: Our Whopper Sandwich is a ¼ lb* of savory flame-grilled beef topped with juicy tomatoes, fresh lettuce, creamy mayonnaise, ketchup, crunchy pickles, and sliced white onions on a soft sesame seed bun.

name: Double Whopper
description: Our Double Whopper Sandwich is a pairing of two ¼ lb* savory flame-grilled beef patties topped with juicy tomatoes, fresh lettuce, creamy mayonnaise, ketchup, crunchy pickles, and sliced white onions on a soft sesame seed bun.

name: Big King XXL
description: Fresh flame-grilled beef, the original BIG KING sauce, and two delicious cheddar cheese slices, fresh lettuce, sliced white onions and crunchy pickles. The BIG KING® XXL is a real ultimate hunger beater.

name: Steakhouse
description: Warm & toasted corn-dusted bun crowns a variety ingredients such as mayonnaise, crispy onions, lettuce, tomato, BBQ sauce, veal bacon, Swiss cheese, Whopper®patty, and warm & toasted corn-dusted bun at the bottom.

name: Double Steakhouse
description: The Double Steakhouse consists of juicy flame-grilled 100% beef pattie topped with bacon, cheese, onions, lettuce, mayo and a deep smoky BBQ sauce in a brioche bun.

name: Whopper Junior
description: Our Whopper Jr. Sandwich features one savory flame-grilled beef patty topped with juicy tomatoes, fresh lettuce, creamy mayonnaise, ketchup, crunchy pickles, and sliced white onions on a soft sesame seed bun.

name: Big King
description: The BIG KING® is one of the biggest in our family. With two freshly flame-grilled 100% pure beef patties, cheese, onions, pickles, lettuce and the unique BIG KING™ sauce, it just tastes amazing.

name: Double Cheese Burger
description: Classic ingredients flavored just right. You can’t go wrong with our Double Cheeseburger, a signature flame-grilled beef patty topped with a simple layer of melted cheese, pickles, and ketchup on a toasted sesame seed bun.

name: Hamburger
description: Our Hamburger is a signature flame-grilled beef patty topped with a simple layer of crinkle cut pickles, yellow mustard, and ketchup on a toasted sesame seed bun.

name: Cheese Burger
description: Classic ingredients flavored just right. You can’t go wrong with our Cheeseburger, a signature flame-grilled beef patty topped with a simple layer of melted cheese, pickles and ketchup on a toasted sesame seed bun.

name: Crispy Chicken
description: Crispy on the outside, soft on the inside. The crispy chicken has everything you would expect from an excellent chicken burger: the finest chicken in a seasoned crispy coating, garnished with crunchy lettuce and freshly sliced tomatoes.

name: Chicken Royal
description: Tasty chicken wrapped in a special crisp coating, topped with iceberg lettuce, creamy mayo and crowned with a toasted sesame seed bun.

name: Chicken Tendercrisp
description: The Chicken Tendercrisp is a yummy chicken delight topped with a tomato slice, freshly shredded lettuce and creamy mayo, then served on a fragrant sesame seed bun.

name: Chicken Burger
description: The chicken burger is a mighty tasty chicken patty on a toasted sesame bun, topped with fresh lettuce and creamy mayonnaise

name: Hamburger Meal
description: Grab a quick meal now paired with fries and a drink.

name: Chicken Burger Meal
description: Grab a quick meal now paired with fries and a drink.

name: Cheese Burger Meal
description: Grab a quick meal now paired with fries and a drink.

name: Whopper Meal
description: Our Whopper Sandwich is a ¼ lb* of savory flame-grilled beef topped with juicy tomatoes, fresh lettuce, creamy mayonnaise, ketchup, crunchy pickles, and sliced white onions on a soft sesame seed bun. Paired with fries and a drink

name: Double Whop meal
description: The Double Whopper Meal is a pairing of our Double Whopper sandwich, fries and a drink.

name: Big King XXL Meal
description: The BIG KING® XXL meal is a combo paired with the Big King XXL burger, fries and a drink

name: Whop Junior Meal
description: Our Whopper Jr. Sandwich is a smaller size of our signature Whopper. The Whopper Junior meal is deliciously paired with fries and a drink

name: Big King Meal
description: The BIG KING® is one of the biggest in our family. The meal is paired with fries and a drink.

name: Double Cheese Burger Meal
description: An easy meal, the Double cheeseburger features our Classic ingredients flavored just right. Grab a quick meal now paired with fries and a drink.

name: Steakhouse Meal
description: The Steakhouse meal is a combo paired with the Steakhouse burger, fries and a drink.

name: Double Steakhouse Meal
description: The Double Steakhouse consists of juicy flame-grilled 100% beef pattie topped with bacon, cheese, onions, lettuce, mayo and a deep smoky BBQ sauce in a brioche bun with paired fries and a drink.

name: Chicken Royal Meal
description: The Chicken Royale meal is a Tasty chicken meal paired with fries and a drink

name: Chicken Tendercrisp Meal
description: The Chicken Tendercrisp meal makes this burger a must try! Paired with Fries and a drink for a filling and satisfying experience.

name: Chicken Crispy Meal
description: The crispy chicken meal is an excellent chicken burger treat paired with fries, and a drink

name: Kids Meal Cheese Burger
description: Our Cheeseburger King Jr™ Meal is a signature flame-grilled beef patty topped with a simple layer of melted cheese and ketchup on a toasted sesame seed bun with paired fries and a drink.
